title: Interpretation of a dream about Hajj

preview.html: People who dream of going to Hajj or Umrah have a certain interpretation and evidence, so we will explain it to you, dear reader, in this article. Interpretation of the vision of Hajj and Umrah by the translator Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that if he sees that he is performing Hajj, all of this is in his dream. This indicates that the dreamer will happen to him in His condition and that he will believe. It also indicates that this person who is dreaming has had a one-on-one dialogue with Almighty God and that God has accepted his prayer. Likewise, Hajj to the dreamer in a dream indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance. The dream of seeing Hajj and Umrah in a dream is one of the few dreams that It comes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream: If a person dreams that he sees himself circumambulating the Kaaba and performing the complete rituals of Hajj in his dream. This indicates the goodness that comes to the dreamer. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself performing the Hajj ritual in his dream. This indicates that this The dreamer will pay his debt. But whoever dreams that he sees himself going for Hajj at the specified time. This is evidence that the dreamer will return from the trip to his country. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone reading the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for Hajj or Umrah. Who dreams that he is preparing to perform Hajj or Umrah rituals. Performing the Hajj obligation in general. This heralds the arrival of goodness for the dreamer. The translator Ibn Shirin also interpreted the dream to mean preparing to perform the Hajj obligation or actually performing the Hajj obligation. Such a dream is good throughout the dreamer’s life. But if the dreamer has debts and dreams that he is preparing to perform the Hajj obligation. Hajj or that he is actually performing Hajj. This indicates that the dreamer will be judged by God. Or if the dreamer is sick, then God Almighty will forgive his illness and heal him. Likewise, if the dreamer is poor, then God Almighty will make him rich. This is also when the dreamer attends Hajj or Umrah in his dream. This is evidence that the dreamer will be blessed by God with a long life, as well as righteousness, piety, and uprightness in religion. Interpretation of going for Hajj at an unspecified time with the family in the dream. The dream of witnessing Hajj at the specified time indicates an abundance of goodness. This is according to what was interpreted by scholars such as Al-Nabulsi the interpreter and Ibn Sirin, which is when the dreamer sees that he will perform Hajj at an inappropriate time. This bodes well in addition to the fact that he will succeed in all areas of life. Such as that he will get a job or be promoted to a position higher than him and succeed in his job. But if the dreamer is single, then God Almighty will bless him. With a good wife who is distinguished by beauty. Then God Almighty blesses him with Hajj. Therefore, we notice, dear reader, that attending Hajj in a dream indicates comfort and that the dreamer’s worries will go away. The pillar of Hajj has a great reward. Likewise, if the dreamer sees that he is performing Hajj, and this dream was while performing the Hajj obligation. This means that he will earn a lot of money. This dream also indicates that the dreamer will be cured of illness and sin. This dream also indicates that the dreamer will receive many gifts. Also, the dream of witnessing Hajj and Umrah in a dream for a person indicates marriage. He will also achieve a goal. He was asking for it from God Almighty, or it may be repentance. Interpretation of seeing Hajj or Umrah in a dream When an unmarried girl dreams that she is going to

title: I dreamed that I was walking barefoot down the street to a married woman

preview.html: I dreamed that I was walking barefoot in the street to a married woman. Through the site, see the site roy2a.com. In their daily lives, people wear many types of clothes that cover the feet, whether they are shoes, slippers, socks, or other names, and they all work to protect the feet from any harm and seeing a person Barefoot in a dream is considered a disturbing vision for many and raises their concerns about whether it brings good or evil, and for this we will present the most important interpretations given by the great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Muhammad. - Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, on this topic, follow us. I dreamed that I was walking barefoot in the street to a married woman. Seeing a married woman walking barefoot in a dream and looking for something means that he is going through financial crises and difficulties in life. A dream of walking barefoot for a married woman is an indication of the pressures and psychological problems that she is suffering from. In her life and her inability to carry out her duties and responsibilities. Taking off a married woman’s shoes and walking barefoot in a dream is an unpleasant vision that indicates a crisis. Many dream interpretation scholars also point out that seeing a married woman walking barefoot in a dream indicates specific reproductive problems that you have. As for seeing a married woman Wearing shoes? After walking barefoot in a dream, it is a sign that she will get rid of her crises and change her circumstances for the better. Wearing shoes after walking barefoot for a married woman is an indication of her good thinking and dominant mind that takes matters into her own hands. See another interpretation: Questions about football. I dreamed that I was walking barefoot. Feet on the road leading to Ibn Sirin’s wife. Taking off shoes in a married woman’s sleep and walking barefoot indicates a dispute between her and her husband, which may lead to divorce. Seeing running barefoot in a married woman’s dream indicates her bad psychological conditions and her suffering from many problems in her life. See another interpretation: Interpretation of a vision Running on green land in a dream: I dreamed that I was walking barefoot in the street for single women. Seeing walking barefoot in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of her imminent marriage. Seeing running barefoot in a person’s dream indicates that there is someone coming to propose to her soon. As for seeing an unmarried woman walking in A long, arduous and arduous road while she is barefoot in a dream. It is considered a sign of her poor psychological state, loneliness and depression. Walking barefoot in the mud in one dream does not talk about the obstacles she faces in her life. Wearing shoes after walking barefoot in a woman’s dream indicates a relentless pursuit of achieving her goals and achieving what she You want it in life. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing me smiling in a dream. I dreamed that I was walking barefoot in the street for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman walking barefoot in a dream indicates the problems and pain she suffers during pregnancy and during childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman barefoot in a dream is considered a bad sight that warns her To take care of her health and the health of her child and take the necessary precautions and care. I dreamed that I was walking barefoot

title: What you do not know about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a girl, cutting hair in a dream for a married woman, and cutting hair for a pregnant woman in a dream

preview.html: Cutting hair in a dream and its interpretation, especially for a girl. Haircut for girls. We may find that it is natural for you to do it in terms of renewal or changing the appearance, while this differs in the case of a dream about a haircut. We will find different meanings and meanings according to the condition of the dreamer, as well as according to the interpreters, and they differ from one world of interpretation to another, as dreams have another world of their own. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair by Ibn Sirino. Whoever sees herself cutting her hair, this indicates that she will repay her debts. And seeing hair cut in a dream It means imminent death or separation. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for Nablus: Hair will be cut in a dream during the period of Hajj, and this means atonement for sins, and good deeds indicate the purity of the servant. Cutting hair in the holy months, this indicates the death of the dreamer of sadness. The owner of status and status in a dream saw that he He cuts his hair, this portends a distasteful dream, and God knows best. You have a dream that confuses you by waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a married woman. All white hair in a married woman’s dream indicates an immoral and immoral husband. And whoever sees his hair falling out completely without any representation. This indicates the stress, tension, and anxiety that afflicts the dreamer. The person who sees himself bald indicates an increase in livelihood and livelihood. Interpretation of seeing baldness in a dream: Whoever sees himself in a dream without hair, i.e. bald, and begins to see hair, this indicates an abundance of goodness. From He saw himself starting to gather and pluck the existing strands of his hair, then this indicates damage to money and loss to the dreamer. Whoever has hair grows on his head or elsewhere, and is devoid of hair at first, this indicates Saladin and death in a short time in reality. Interpretation haircut for one girl shows Cutting your armpit indicates that you have achieved a goal. The lengthening of armpit hair in a dream - and this is something unacceptable - in the dream indicates that there will be harm that will happen to the dreamer. Plucking some hair from the chest and neck, which indicates the need to restore trust to its owners. Cutting a pregnant woman’s hair in a dream indicates the appearance of a mustache. A pregnant woman will give birth to a boy. Cutting her hair in a state of peace indicates that she is rich in money and children. Cutting a married woman’s hair in a dream without being pregnant means that she will not give birth, but rather secure herself. A girl cutting her hair indicates a great misfortune that has befallen a member of her family or With it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Sources:- 1- The Book of Discourse on the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifa, Beirut, 2000.2- The Dictionary of the Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi, Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.3- The Book Perfumes in expressing dreams, Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi.

title: Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream on different occasions. They are a cute bird, often found in flocks, and some want to raise them on rooftops and in pigeon towers scattered in some rural villages, but what is the interpretation of seeing them in a dream? How does vision differ depending on the state of God? This is what we will learn through an encyclopedia article about seeing a dove in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream Seeing a dove in a dream means the release of one’s fears, the return of the absent, or happy news if it flies over the dreamer or lands on one of his shoulders. There are those who confirm the good news that invitations She answers by seeing a dove, and seeing a dove in the house, to marry a single woman, as he likes from his personality and appearance. Whoever dreams of clipping the wings of a dove, this means that his wife is pregnant or is about to give birth if she is pregnant. The white dove indicates religion, or faith and certainty, and the black dove shows the masters of men. And men and women, and glory, and seeing a dove in a meeting (its white mixed with black) shows a lot of mixing, and a gray dove is evidence of a lot of goodness and the approach of good news. If the dove comes with a beautiful appearance, and needs evidence of its good reputation, the justice of its character, and its religion. If The pigeon defecates or urinates, this means that it is very good. And if the pigeon stands in the net of the fortuneteller, this indicates his engagement to a girl. And if the dove stands on the priest’s shoulder, this is evidence of his wife’s solidarity and assistance to him. And whoever sees the pigeon pecking at him, this is evidence of the determination of women from About him in their requests. The dove carrying a message in a dream is a warning sign or a human sign, depending on the dreamer’s condition and what he is going through. The vision of the dove heralds relief for the prisoner, a blessing for the rich and an increase in livelihood for the poor. The dove also shows believers many memories, and disobedience rebukes the beloved. If a woman sees herself feeding pigeons, this is evidence that she is seeking to prepare her daughters for marriage, and if she is unmarried, this means that she is about to get married and consult those around her. Whoever dreams that he is eating pigeons, this is evidence of his enjoyment, and whoever sees himself catching pigeons, this is evidence that he has accumulated a lot of money. Likewise, from the vision of a pigeon that quickly enters his house, he receives urgent news. If the dove flies to the dreamer, and takes him to heaven, then this is the approach of joy and happiness for him. If he sees another dove, then he is committing adultery, and whoever thinks that he is feeding the pigeons is a pimp, Especially if it is someone else's dove, and whoever sees himself turning into a dove, this is a sign that he receives it from enemies. And they eat their money. Interpretation of a dream about little pigeons: Seeing pigeon eggs in a dream is a sign of girls, while chicks are boys. Whoever sees a pigeon’s nest in a dream, this is evidence of the bedroom, and whoever sees pigeons building a nest in his house, this indicates a feeling of security and reassurance in his home, and seeing The nest in the workplace is proof of that. One of the blessings of this work. Seeing a dove feeding its young is evidence of the mother’s interest in her young in the dreamer’s life. Seeing eggs in the nest indicates pregnancy for the wife or one of her relatives. And

Seeing a dove feeding her young is evidence of the mother's interest in her young in the life of the seer. Seeing eggs in the nest indicates pregnancy for the wife or one of her relatives.

title: Interpretation of seeing smoking in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see smoking in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. Smoking in a dream shows fear, stress, and anxiety and can indicate problems and bad friends. Interpretation of a dream to see smoking in a dream. In detail, dream interpretation to see smoking in a dream for single, married and pregnant women. Smoking is considered a habit for many men and has recently become Usually for women, and also, it is the process in which tobacco materials are burned and smoking has many harms for smokers and non-smokers just because they are in a place where there is smoke from the smoking process. Smoking for those who smoke actually indicates a sin or a mistake and may indicate anxiety and psychological pressure and will not happen. A smoker indicates good and future money. Interpretation of a dream about smoking by Ibn Sirin: Dream interpretation scholars have unanimously agreed that smoking in a dream indicates a period of nervous and psychological tension. That man needs to take a vacation to calm down from these pressures, because they indicate tension and anxiety. A person sees in his dream that he smokes, but in reality he does not smoke, and this indicates that the person having the vision wants to protect himself from the harm of others. The person sees in his dream that he is sitting among a group of people who smoke but do not smoke. This indicates that the person who saw him smokes in His dreams will create problems for the visionary. But whoever sees in his dreams that he has quit smoking, this indicates that his will is strong. He will get rid of the problems and crises that he is going through and be able to confront and deal with them. Seeing a person in a dream smoking, this indicates that the dreamer and the person who He saw him smoking, there is disagreement between them and problems. Seeing someone in his dream that he is smoking in a place where smoking is prohibited, this indicates that the person is suffering from problems and cannot solve them. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is smoking and smoking black cigarettes, this is a warning to the viewer that he will be exposed to trouble and perhaps Loss. For a person to see in his dream that he is smoking and the color of smoke is normal and this indicates that success has been achieved in his life. Therefore, for someone to see in his dream that he is smoking and feels happy smoking means that the person who has the vision lives alone. Seeing smoke in the dream indicates To gossip and remind people of heartache and trouble. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing drugs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about smoking for a single woman: Seeing smoking heavily and violently in a girl’s dream is evidence that this girl will meet new people. But it will harm her and may indicate that she will hear news that will harm her. To harm her psychologically. Seeing a feeling of happiness and carrying a cigarette in a girl’s dream is evidence that she has bad friends who will harm her. Because it indicates that she knows the cripples who steal her money and everything she has and leave her alone and homeless. The passion for smoking in a girl’s dream is evidence that she will fall ill in the near future. And the severity of the disease will be equal to the severity of smoking in the dream. Read also: Interpretation of seeing an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Because it indicates her knowledge of the cripples who steal her money and everything she has and leave her alone without shelter. The passion for smoking in a girl’s dream is evidence that she will suffer from an illness in the near future, and the severity of the illness will be equal to the severity of smoking in the dream. title: Seeing God in a dream, hearing God's voice, or talking to God in a dream

preview.html: Seeing God in a dream raises many questions for many, and many believe that this vision is from Satan because Almighty God cannot be seen. But can a man see God in a dream? Yes, it is possible, but what he sees is not the truth, because Almighty God “is like Nothing.” Seeing God in a dream Seeing God in a dream, according to the opinions of many interpretation scholars, brings goodness and happiness to the dreamer. It indicates the extent of the righteousness of religion and the circumstances that the dreamer will be exposed to in his future. If the sick person sees God, this indicates death in the near future. Urgent. Also, seeing God in a dream expresses the extent of a person’s love for his Lord and brings him to Him with prayers and acts of obedience. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an. Mentioning the name of God in a dream. Seeing someone mentioning the name of God in a dream expresses his love and closeness to God through worship. It also indicates A person’s commitment to obedience and worship imposed on him. In the event that he sees or hears the name of God, this indicates the high and lofty position that the dreamer will reach. Many interpretive scholars have agreed that in the event that he hears the words of God, this is evidence of the status that the dreamer will gain among people and society. In which he lives, so that he has a word that everyone hears and everyone loves. . The vision of hearing God’s voice indicates the dreamer’s security in his life and the fulfillment of many dreams that he desires in his future. Talking with God in a dream Talking with God is unnatural because it is impossible because it is God’s miracle with Moses, peace be upon him. Therefore, seeing someone talking to God and speaking to Him It indicates the extent of a person’s commitment to listening to the Qur’an and performing the duties of obedience. The message of speaking to God is praise and thanksgiving between the servant and his Lord, in addition to the extent to which a person loves the Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet and follows them often. If we talk to God and feel joy, this indicates the fulfillment of dreams that a person desires to have. His future and God’s response to his prayers. I read about this: Symptoms of magic. Seeing the word of God in a dream. Seeing the word of God in a dream is one of the good visions that bring goodness to the Lord, and the vision varies according to the state of the god. Seeing the name of God expresses his true religion, with an increase in the grace and mercy of God that he enjoys. God in his life. It represents the fulfillment of dreams and goals and good luck in the next life. Seeing the name of God symbolizes getting rid of worries and the end of problems. It is also a sign of success for the Lord in his life, and this is evidence that he will be blessed with goodness and success in study or professional life. Hearing the voice God in a dream: Seeing yourself hearing the voice of God is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will be blessed with righteousness, especially if the person is interested in reciting the Holy Qur’an. In the event that he hears the voice of God in anger, this indicates the anger and resentment that a person is exposed to in his life. If a person hears the words of God without a veil indicates the extent of the servant’s negligence in matters of his religion. If a fortuneteller hears God’s promise of good news, it is evidence of the mercy that a person will receive in his life in this world and the hereafter. If someone hears the words of God and adheres to them, this is evidence that God

title: Interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream and interpretation of harassment from relatives

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream through a website in the dream. Follow the opinions of scholars and dream interpreters about the interpretation of harassment in a dream for single and married women and harassment from relatives. Harassment is considered an outcast and bad morals in society and religion, and it is widespread in our societies due to lack of religious awareness. Interpretation of a dream Harassment Harassment in a dream symbolizes many meanings. Perhaps harassing the dreamer indicates that he has committed some sins, or perhaps he is violating the rights of others or dishonoring people. Perhaps harassing a girl in a dream means that the dreamer will marry this girl, but he will face obstacles. Seeing harassment in a dream is a warning and the dreamer must be careful not to commit Sins. See also: Interpretation of a dream of rape. Interpretation of a dream of kidnapping. Seeing harassment in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s desire for desires, and harassment in a dream may indicate competition. Harassment in dreams generally indicates that both parties are harmed. Interpretation of a dream of harassment by relatives. Dreaming of harassment by relatives is An unwanted dream, whether for the harasser or the harassed, and may indicate illness, especially if it is incest. Harassment of relatives in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is lost and needs to return to God. Interpretation of a dream about harassment. Harassment in a dream for an unmarried woman shows a warning to her By staying away from sins. If she sees in her dream someone who she knows is harassing her, she should be careful or stay away from him. I read about that: Sex in a dream Escape to a dream Harassment in a dream for a married woman A dream about harassment for a married woman in a dream may indicate the insincerity of her feelings with her husband. Harassment may indicate In a dream about a woman who is married to someone she knows, this person says bad things about her. Learn about: Symptoms of witchcraft. Watch the video interpretation of a dream about harassment in a dream. We provide you with the interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream. Greetings from the site’s family in Sincere Dreams. To interpret your dream, you can comment below the article by writing your dream. We will respond to you within hours.

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about fasting

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fasting: Fasting is one of the things that fills the heart and soul with joy and happiness. As for seeing fasting during a period other than the holy month in a dream, are its connotations as good as reality? The dream, and in the following lines we explain all the details and indicators, so that the insightful heart is reassured. Interpretation of the dream of fasting. The leading scholars have interpreted that seeing fasting in a dream is evidence of the good news that the dreamer will receive in the coming days. But when the dreamer sees that he is fasting the month of Ramadan in a dream, this is a sign of not His ability to bear the burdens of life that fall heavily on him due to excessively high prices is beyond his ability to do so. bear. Which is not compatible with his living and living conditions. While if the dreamer is a merchant and sees in his dream that he is fasting Ramadan, this indicates the great loss that will happen to him in trade and will cause him a significant decrease in his profits during this year. Seeing a man while he is fasting during his sleep indicates He makes a lot of effort to achieve a bright future and has a great position in society. Interpretation of a dream about fasting by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing fasting in a dream is a sign that the dreamer considers God in all his deeds, helps many needy people, and performs many charitable works. Seeing fasting In a dream, it means that the dreamer always follows the right path and refrains from any wrong behavior or behavior that would negatively affect him in the future. However, if fasting the month of Ramadan occurs while the dreamer is sleeping, this is an indication that he will spend days in the coming periods in which he will not be able to bear the responsibility. His family because of the high secrets. But if a person dreams that he intentionally breaks his fast while fasting, this means that he does not look to God and does not practice the matters of his religion, and God will punish him severely. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search On Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about fasting for a single woman: Dreaming of an unmarried woman fasting means that she is characterized by good qualities that always make her a special girl and a beloved person among many people. The dream of fasting also in the dreamer’s dream indicates her good reputation among many people who mention her. Always with kindness. Seeing an unmarried woman sincerely intending to fast in her dream indicates the blessings and goodness that will abundantly flood her life in the coming days, God willing. A girl’s dream of fasting in a dream indicates that she is doing many good and desirable things that will always bring her closer to God. Interpretation of dreams about fasting And breaking the fast for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing fasting and breaking the fast in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she performs her duties to the fullest and takes care of her family’s affairs and always helps her in many matters. Seeing fasting and breaking the fast also in a dream is evidence that the dreamer always does well in the affairs of his life and uses his mind in things. There are many things and passion will not be followed if it does not benefit her in anything. However, if an unmarried woman sees that she broke her fast before hearing the ear in her dream, this means that she lives in

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about grains in a dream: success and marital disputes

preview.html: The appearance of grains in a dream is one of the recurring visions in the dreams of many men and women, which carries many different meanings that combine positive and negative meanings, depending on the psychological and social state of the dreamer and depending on the place where the grains appear. Wheat in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about almonds in a dream for a single woman - A symbol of seeing almonds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about grains in a dream of a single girl. Dream interpreters say that many red grains on the face of an unmarried girl indicate that this girl is beautiful and attractive, so many men will propose to her in the coming period. As for the grains that appear in In the hand of an unmarried girl, it indicates the arrival of a lot of food and money in the near future for that girl. If the girl with the vision is studying this year, the appearance of grains in the dream is one of the signs that heralds her excellence in her studies this year. The grains cause pain in the girl’s face without Married woman, researcher Ibn Shaheen says that it may indicate that this girl will be exposed to a major scandal in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream by Ibn Sirin - a symbol of seeing a coffin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about grains in a dream for a married woman. The grains that appear in a married woman’s dream are signs that indicate To acquire great wealth or a lot of money without effort and hardship. But Ibn Sirin says that the red pimples that cause pain in the face of a married woman may be one of the signs that indicate multiple problems and marital disputes in this woman’s life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing power in a dream. Interpretation Dreaming of grains in a pregnant woman’s dreamDream interpreters confirm that white grains are signs indicating the birth of a child, while red grains indicate the birth of a male child. Grains in a pregnant woman’s dream can be a sign of the good health of this woman, as well as the fetus. Grains in the pregnant woman’s stomach from Signs that the time of birth is approaching and the woman must prepare for it. Interpretation of a dream about handkerchiefs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pimples in a man’s dreamDream interpreters say that if pimples appear on the hand of a person who has a vision, this means that he will earn a lot of halal money in the coming days. Pimples could be On the leg is one of the signs that the dreamer is moving from the current job in which he works to another, better job. Dream interpreters confirm that the pimples in general are signs that indicate material and emotional stability in the dreamer’s life. The pimples that cause pain to the man may be that he currently has many enemies Those who are trying to harm him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a chameleon in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about grains in a young man’s dream. Red grains in a young man’s dream indicate that this young man will enter into a new romantic love story in the coming period. White grains in a dream are signs that indicate the good luck that awaits this young man. In the coming period of his life. If the pimples in the young man’s dream are black, it is one of the signs that indicate the presence of many haters and envious people in his life.
